solution_line_template: If there were {first_week_cases} new cases on the first week, the total for the second week is {fraction_second_week} * {first_week_cases} cases = <<{first_week_cases}*{fraction_second_week}={second_week_cases}>>{second_week_cases} cases.

The total number of new coronavirus cases in the three weeks is {second_week_cases} cases + {first_week_cases} cases + {third_week_cases} cases = <<{second_week_cases}+{first_week_cases}+{third_week_cases}={total_cases}>>{total_cases} cases.
